Text: Graphics updated a bit, a little bit sharper.  Various bug fixes (it crashes less than the first edition).  NO HOT COFFEE MOD.

Oh, and the game has a version of DEP (Data Execution Prevention) built in, so most trainers and no cd cracks won't work with this version.  But if you just mount the ISO image anytime you want to play the game, then you will be fine
